title: Onwards! Accessibility auditing with WCAG 2.2 and beyond | Torchbox

metadata.description: We’re redesigning our own website. We want our aesthetic glow-up _and_ also to make it as accessible and inclusive as possible. Here are our findings and our methodology from an initial accessibility audit of the current website, looking at WCAG 2.2 and beyond.
